Method.name: OnPageHEAD
Method.Implementation: Write "<head>" Write "<title>"_($G(%session.Data("systemname")))_"</title>",! Write "<link href=""style.css"" type=text/css rel=stylesheet>" Write !,"<style>" Write !,"body{font-face: arial; font-size: 12}",! Write "</style>" Write !,"<script language=""jscript"" src=""common.js"">" Write "</script>" Write !,"<script language=""jscript"">" Write !,"function startFun(){",! Write "if(PropDesc.value==""""){alert(""Не заполнено Наименование свойства"");return false;}",! Write "if(window.confirm(""Создать ""+PropDesc.value+""?"")==false)return false;",! Write "window.returnValue=PropDesc.value;",! Write "window.close();",! Write "}",! Write !,"</script>" Write !,"</head>"

Method.name: OnPageHTML
Method.Implementation: Write "<html>" Write ! Do ..OnPageHEAD() Write ! Do ..OnPageBODY() Write !,"</html>"
